title: Toh Baat Pakki
descriptions: "Toh Baat Pakki" (2010) is a drama that revolves around the complex relationship between two families from different backgrounds. Set in a small town, the film explores the themes of love, tradition, and the clash between modernity and tradition. When Ayesha, from a conservative family, falls in love with Rohan, from a more liberal background, their families' disapproval threatens to tear them apart. As the story unfolds, the couple faces numerous challenges, including societal pressure and family expectations. The film delves into the journey of their love, testing the strength of their bond and their willingness to defy convention for each other.
